title: Sausage, radicchio and lemon gnocchi
description: This spicy, citrussy recipe is James Martin's take on a dish made by chef Stephen Terry at The Hardwick in Abergavenny.
ingredients: 4 large floury potatoes, such as Maris Piper
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
75g/3oz type ‘00’ pasta flour, plus extra for dusting
4 good-quality pork sausages, skins removed, roughly chopped
1 tsp chilli flakes, or to taste
2 tbsp roughly chopped fresh flatleaf parsley leaves, plus extra to serve
2 unwaxed lemons, finely grated zest only
1 large radicchio, cut into wedges through the root
